p: In-vivo activity assay of superoxide dismutase was carried out in developing endosperm and harvested seeds of wheat cvs. HD3086 and BT-Schomburgk under differential HS. We observed very prominent bands of manganese-SOD (Mn-SOD) and copper/ zinc-SOD (Cu/Zn SOD) in developing grains of wheat cv. HD3086 and faint bands of different isoforms of SODs in wheat cv. BT-Schomburgk under T 1 and T 2 treatments ( Fig. 9a). The intensity of Cu/Zn SOD in developing grains was very high in both the cvs. under HS. in vivo assay of SOD in harvested seeds showed very prominent bands of Fe-SOD and Cu/Zn SOD, and faint band of Mn-SOD in both the cvs. under HS ( Fig. 9b). The intensity of the bands was better in HD3086 compared with BT-Schomburgk under HS.
